Figures for April 
2019-06-03
China’s service trade totaled 431.5 billion yuan (US$64.2 billion) in April, data showed.
   Exports for service trade stood at US$20 billion while imports reached US$44.2 billion, according to the State Administration of Foreign Exchange.
   The country’s trade in goods totaled US$360.1 billion in April, with exports and imports reaching US$191 billion and 169.1 billion, respectively.
